  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buildable, LoggingDisplay, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class LoggingTab
extends BuildableJPanel
implements LoggingDisplay
    Class that allows the users to display the logs.
    Author:
    kocur
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
